hypothesis_content.title: Political Memecoin (TRUMP) Election Cycle Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes with BTC between $85K-$90K, TRUMP memecoin will show positive momentum divergence (higher highs on lower selling pressure) when election-related news volume increases by >200% vs 30d average, outperforming general memecoin basket by 15-25% over 5-day period.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Political memecoins have unique catalysts unrelated to general crypto market cycles. During neutral BTC regimes, idiosyncratic narratives dominate. Election cycle creates sustained news flow unlike one-off events. TRUMP has established community that responds predictably to political developments.
entry_conditions: Election news volume (tracked via crypto news APIs) >200% of 30d MA
TRUMP/BTC pair breaks above 10-day SMA on increasing volume
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If election news volume fails to translate to TRUMP trading volume, or if TRUMP shows negative beta to positive election news.
